EmailTemplate.subject: AeroFlight KI 300 Attitude Indicator and KA 310 Autopilot Adapter Now Certified
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
One of the three highly-anticipated BendixKing cockpit upgrades is now FAA certified <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/bendixking-receives-certification-for-three-highly-anticipated-cockpit-upgrades]]>: the AeroFlight <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]> KI 300 attitude indicator plus the KA 310 autopilot adapter!
- Serves as a primary or backup attitude indicator - Replaces the KI 255/256 flight director indicator and the KG 258 attitude indicator - Natively supports KAP 100, 150, 200; KFC 150, 200, 225 and others
We’re also excited to announce recent partnerships that include AeroFlight <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeroflight]]> as part of their preferred flight deck and upgrade retrofits:
AeroFlight was recently chosen as part of a new cockpit upgrade program <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/bendixking-offers-new-cockpit-upgrades-for-over-6-000-cessna-aircraft]]> for 6,000 Cessna single-engine piston aircraft.
Pipistrel <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/bendixking-and-pipistrel-to-enhance-pilot-training-with-a-touchscreen-integrated-flight-deck?utm_source=social&utm_medium=facebook&utm_campaign=19_bendixking_xvuetouch]]> announced AeroFlight, along with the entire BendixKing Touch Integrated Flight Deck, will be installed in their Alpha King training aircraft.
Joe Coraggio <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/case-studies/2019/july/upgraded-flight-panel-gives-race-pilot-an-edge]]>, professional pilot, builder, mentor and air race pilot, has AeroFlight as part of his BendixKing panel in his Lancair Legacy, and placed 1st in the 2019 AirVenture Cup Race.
Please let us know if you are still interested in more information or would like to order AeroFlight.
I’M INTERESTED <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroFlight_KI_300.html]]>
